title: Visual Instructional Design Language-Utilized Practical Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with foundational instructional design theories and digital tools
context.additional_context: Iterative design improvement through real-time collaborative walkthroughs and formative feedback in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can identify core components of visual instructional design languages (E2ML/PoEML/coUML) with 90% accuracy.
Learners can create visual models based on real-world job scenarios with 80% completion accuracy.
Learners can iteratively improve design models through peer feedback at least twice.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
